trans-unit.source: Specifies the style and behavior of a control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o estilo e o comportamento de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Controls use this enumeration in various properties and methods to specify functionality.
trans-unit.target: Controles de usam essa enumeração em várias propriedades e métodos para especificar a funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method and passing in the appropriate ControlStyles bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode habilitar um estilo chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>método e passar o bit de ControlStyles apropriada (ou bits) e o valor booliano para definir o ão para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following line of Visual Basic code would enable double-buffering.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a seguinte linha de código do Visual Basic deve habilitar o buffer duplo.

trans-unit.source: ``` myControl.SetStyle(UserPaint Or AllPaintingInWmPaint Or DoubleBuffer, True) ``` If the AllPaintingInWmPaint bit is set to `true`, the window message WM_ERASEBKGND is ignored, and both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> methods are called directly from the window message WM_PAINT.
trans-unit.target: ``` myControl.SetStyle(UserPaint Or AllPaintingInWmPaint Or DoubleBuffer, True) ```Se o bit AllPaintingInWmPaint é definido como `true`, a mensagem de janela WM_ERASEBKGND é ignorado e ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>métodos são chamados diretamente da mensagem de janela WM_PAINT.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: This generally reduces flicker unless other controls send the window message WM_ERASEBKGND to the control.
trans-unit.target: Isso geralmente reduz a cintilação, a menos que outros controles de enviar a mensagem de janela WM_ERASEBKGND para o controle.

trans-unit.source: You might send the window message WM_ERASEBKGRND to achieve a pseudo-transparent effect similar to SupportsTransparentBackColor; for example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with flat appearance does this.
trans-unit.target: Você pode enviar a mensagem de janela WM_ERASEBKGRND para atingir um efeito de transparência pseudo semelhante a SupportsTransparentBackColor; Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>com aparência simples faz isso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: To fully enable double-buffering, you can set the OptimizedDoubleBuffer and AllPaintingInWmPaint bits to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar completamente o buffer duplo, você pode definir os bits OptimizedDoubleBuffer e AllPaintingInWmPaint para `true`.

trans-unit.source: However the preferred method for enabling double buffering, which yields the same result, is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> property for the control to `true`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o método preferencial para habilitar o buffer duplo, o que produz o mesmo resultado, é definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>propriedade para o controle `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SupportsTransparentBackColor bit is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> is set to a color whose alpha component is less than 255, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> will simulate transparency by asking its parent control to paint the background.
trans-unit.target: Se o bit SupportsTransparentBackColor é definido como `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>é definido como uma cor cujo componente alfa é menor que 255 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>simulará transparência solicitando controle pai para pintar o plano de fundo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is not true transparency.
trans-unit.target: Isso não é verdadeira transparência.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there is another control between the control and its parent, the current control will not show the control in the middle.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se não houver outro controle entre o controle e seu pai, o controle atual não mostrará o controle no meio.

trans-unit.source: When the UserMouse bit is set to `true`, the following methods are still called: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseHover%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseWheel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o bit UserMouse é definido como `true`, ainda são chamados de métodos a seguir: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseHover%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseWheel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseWheel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseHover%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the control is clicked, if the StandardClick bit is set to `true` the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called and it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle é clicado, se o bit StandardClick é definido como `true` o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado de método e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the control is double-clicked, and both the StandardClick and StandardDoubleClick bits are set to `true`, the click is passed on to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle é clicado duas vezes, e o StandardClick e StandardDoubleClick bits são definidos como `true`, clique em é passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called and it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado de método e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the control can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A> directly regardless of the StandardClick and StandardDoubleClick bit values.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o controle pode chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A>diretamente, independentemente do StandardClick e StandardDoubleClick valores de bit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on control click and double click behaviors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> topics.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o controle clique e clique duas vezes em comportamentos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>tópicos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the UseTextForAccessibility bit is set and there is a value in the control's `Text` property, the value of that control's `Text` property determines the control's default Active Accessibility name and shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Quando o bit UseTextForAccessibility é definido e houver um valor no controle do `Text` propriedade, o valor desse controle `Text` determina de propriedade do controle padrão acessibilidade ativa nome e tecla de atalho.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the text of the preceding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o texto dos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>controle será usado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: This style is set by default.
trans-unit.target: Este estilo é definido por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Certain built-in control types, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, reset this style so that the `Text` property of those controls will not be used by Active Accessibility.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de determinado controle interno, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, redefinir esse estilo para que o `Text` propriedade desses controles não será usada pelo Active Accessibility.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control ignores the window message WM_ERASEBKGND to reduce flicker.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle ignorará a mensagem da janela WM_ERASEBKGND para reduzir a cintilação.

trans-unit.source: This style should only be applied if the UserPaint bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse estilo deve ser aplicado somente se o bit UserPaint é definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control keeps a copy of the text rather than getting it from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*> each time it is needed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle mantém uma cópia de texto em vez de fazê-lo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>toda vez que for necessário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: This style defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse estilo padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This behavior improves performance, but makes it difficult to keep the text synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento melhora o desempenho, mas é difícil de manter o texto sincronizado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is a container-like control.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle é um controle de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, drawing is performed in a buffer, and after it completes, the result is output to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, desenho é executado em um buffer e depois de concluir, o resultado é gerado na tela.

trans-unit.source: Double-buffering prevents flicker caused by the redrawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Buffer duplo impede a cintilação causada por redesenho do controle.

trans-unit.source: If you set DoubleBuffer to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, you should also set UserPaint and AllPaintingInWmPaint to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir DoubleBuffer como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, você também deve definir UserPaint e AllPaintingInWmPaint para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage*> method is called for every message sent to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o <> </> *> método é chamado para cada mensagem enviada para o controle <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: This style defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse estilo padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: EnableNotifyMessage does not work in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: EnableNotifyMessage não funciona em confiança parcial.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control has a fixed height when auto-scaled.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle possui uma altura fixa quando dimensionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a layout operation attempts to rescale the control to accommodate a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>, the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma operação de layout tenta redimensionar o controle para acomodar um novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>, o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>permanece inalterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control has a fixed width when auto-scaled.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle tem uma largura fixa quando dimensionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a layout operation attempts to rescale the control to accommodate a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>, the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma operação de layout tenta redimensionar o controle para acomodar um novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>, o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>permanece inalterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is drawn opaque and the background is not painted.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle é desenhado opaco e o plano de fundo é pintado não.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is first drawn to a buffer rather than directly to the screen, which can reduce flicker.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle é desenhado primeiro em um buffer em vez de diretamente na tela, que pode reduzir cintilação.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, you should also set the AllPaintingInWmPaint to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir essa propriedade como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, você também deve definir o AllPaintingInWmPaint <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is redrawn when it is resized.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle é redesenhado quando redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle pode receber foco.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control implements the standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle implementa o padrão de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control implements the standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle implementa o padrão de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick"> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.source: This style is ignored if the StandardClick bit is not set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este estilo é ignorado se o bit StandardClick não está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*> with an alpha component of less than 255 to simulate transparency.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle aceita um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>com um componente alfa de menos de 255 para simular a transparência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Transparency will be simulated only if the UserPaint bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the parent control is derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Transparência será simulada somente se o bit UserPaint é definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e o controle pai é derivado de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control does its own mouse processing, and mouse events are not handled by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle executa seu próprio processamento de mouse e eventos de mouse não são manipulados pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control paints itself rather than the operating system doing so.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o controle pinta em vez do sistema operacional ao fazer isso.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> não é gerado.

trans-unit.source: This style only applies to classes derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse estilo só se aplica a classes derivadas de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the value of the control's `Text` property, if set, determines the control's default Active Accessibility name and shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o valor do controle do `Text` propriedade, se definido, determina a chave de nome e o atalho de acessibilidade ativa de padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
